text: The 2018 World Mixed Doubles Curling Championship was held from April 21 to 28 at the Östersund Arena in Östersund, Sweden. The event was held in conjunction with the 2018 World Senior Curling Championships. ==Teams== {| class=wikitable |- !width=250|https://curling.org.au/events/ !width=250| !width=250| !width=250|
